title: Contract for the Connecticut elicense.ct.gov System Issued to Iron Data Solutions

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The contract for the Connecticut elicense.ct.gov System Issued to Iron Data Solutions by the  Connecticut OEC Child Care & Youth Camp Licensing agency.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Toni Thompson

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Arrest and Interrogation

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Arrest and Interrogation
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: December 11, 2024
Location: Miami Beach, FL
Suspects: Alon Alexander, Oren Alexander
Incident Summary: The Alexander brothers were arrested by Miami Beach Police as part of a multi-state investigation into alleged sex trafficking and sexual assault. The bodycam footage reportedly captures their arrest and subsequent interrogations, with Oren Alexander being transported to a police vehicle before questioning began approximately 10 minutes later. A similar interrogation took place with Alon Alexander in a separate room. The total footage reportedly lasts nearly two hours.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Participated in the arrests of Alon and Oren Alexander.
Transported the suspects.
Conducted or were present during their interrogations.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun
